venue.name: New Britain Museum Of American Art

item.description: Enjoy the evening with other singles and enjoy the art and live music.  Come early and we’ll meet inside between 5:30-6:00 pm.  Admission of $10 includes light hors d’oeuvres; wine or beer $3.  For info, call Gail 860-582-8229.  Directions to 56 Lexington Street:  I-84 to 72E or Rt. 9 to 72W, Exit 7 Corbin Avenue, take Rt. 372W to 1st light, turn right onto West Main Street, after 3rd light turn right onto Lexington Street, facility on left.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be inside just past the admission table from 5:30-6:00 pm.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles First Friday
